tool.name: Add AF and DP to VCF
tool.description: Pindel files do not contain the AF or DP fields in the SAMPLE columns. This script will add them. This script will also include a descriptor in the header for these fields.

param.name: input_vcf
param.label: Input VCF
param.help: Pindel VCF without the AF field.

param.name: vaf
param.label: VAF Cutoff
param.help: Restrict output to variants with at least this variant allele frequency.

param.name: format_label
param.label: FORMAT Field Label
param.help: This tool will look for the field you select here and compute allele frequencies based off of it.

param.name: margin
param.label: Allele Frequency Spread
param.help: Allele frequencies with spread lower than this value will be considered the same if they are also not below the threshold defined below.

param.name: thresh
param.label: Allele Frequency Lower Limit
param.help: If allele frequencies are below this value, this record will be included regardless.

data.name: output_vcf
data.label: VCF With AF and DP Fields Included

tool.help: Add AF and DP fields to VCF when missing. Also, perform filtering of records where tumor and normal are the same, defined by above parameters.
